title: BRIEF-Scotiabank To Acquire Jarislowsky Fraser

organizations.name: brief-scotiabank to acquire jarislowsky fraser reuters

text:
26 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Scotiabank To Acquire Jarislowsky Fraser Reuters Staff 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Bank Of Nova Scotia: * SCOTIABANK TO ACQUIRE JARISLOWSKY FRASER 
* BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA - PURCHASE PRICE PAYABLE AT CLOSING OF APPROXIMATELY $950 MILLION WILL BE SATISFIED PRIMARILY BY ISSUANCE OF SCOTIABANK COMMON SHARES. 
* BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA - FOLLOWING COMPLETION OF THESE REPURCHASES, SCOTIABANK EXPECTS TRANSACTION TO BE ACCRETIVE TO EARNINGS IN FY 2020 
* BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA - WILL OFFSET DILUTIVE IMPACT OF ISSUANCE OF SHARES TO SATISFY PURCHASE PRICE BY REPURCHASING A SIMILAR AMOUNT OF COMMON SHARES 
* BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA - SCOTIABANK EXPECTS TRANSACTION TO BE ACCRETIVE TO EARNINGS IN FY 2020. 
* BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA - AN EARN-OUT OF UP TO $56 MILLION IN ADDITIONAL SCOTIABANK COMMON SHARES MAY BE PAID BASED ON GROWTH TARGETS Source text for Eikon:
